content: Turning to expenses, adjusted operating expenses increased 92% in the quarter as compared to 217% increase in revenue and this has resulted in a stronger adjusted EBITDA fall through which is defined as incremental adjusted EBITDA over incremental revenue and in the second quarter adjusted EBITDA fall through on pro forma basis was 63% which demonstrates our operating leverage. On a pro forma basis transaction volume increased by 194% and TTV improved by 294% as compared to the second quarter of 2021 on a pro forma basis, transaction recovery was 69% up to 19 in the quarter, which is a very impressive 45 percentage point improvement year-over-year versus .
